Package ViewController

Class ModProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewController.ModProductController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModProductController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    The ModProductController class is the controller class for the Modify Product screen.

      • onActionCancelModProduct

        void onActionCancelModProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Returns the user to the main screen. The functionality of this method could be expanded. Currently, if a part is disassociated (removed from bottom table) from the product, and then the "cancel" button is clicked, the part remains disassociated. Future functionality would include restoring the removed parts upon clicking the "cancel" button. This could possibly be implemented by storing removed parts in a temporary list, and then including code in this method to copy values from the temporary list to the associated parts list upon clicking "cancel".
        Parameters:
        event -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
